name: Gravitron
description: Gravitron (Powered by Amazon) is a cutting-edge AI Telegram bot At the heart of Gravitron lies the advanced Graviton4 Amazon processing chip, ensuring unparalleled performance. Our Gravitron bots are dedicated to safeguarding cryptocurrency traders, offering rapid analysis of transactions from major whale wallets. These wallets hold not just a significant amount of tokens but also play a crucial role in your journey as a successful trader.
